thread.section_title: ShoeDazzle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ShoeDazzle | www.shoedazzle.com
thread.title: Nicole

author: Nicole
title: Nicole
text: I can't say enough about the selection, the prices, the service, and the collections. I have bought many shoes from this place and EVERY time I wear them I get complimented on them. Can't find them anywhere else and they look like I paid a house payment for them when I didn't. The clothes are just another reason to love Shoedazzle. They are stylish and trendy. Great company.
